nodes.text: The Conjo fighter was a type of atmospheric fighter produced by Aratech and used by planetary defense forces which either couldn't afford or saw no need for true starfighters. These small wedge-shaped craft used combination repulsorlift/ion afterburners to achieve supersonic speeds, while sophisticated vector controls and atmospheric streamlining gave them incredible maneuverability. Many variants of Conjo fighters existed, including ground attack, air superiority and trainer models.

There were three squadrons of Conjo fighters in the G'rho Defense Force. When the Ssi-ruu attacked the planet in 2 BBY, Major Brco ordered his Conjo fighters to attack. Two Conjo pilots were Trig and Seni Kilwallen.
